text: When should I choose Provisioned IOPS over Standard RDS storage?
choiceList: A. If you have batch-oriented workloads
B. If you use production online transaction processing (OLTP) workloads
C. If you have workloads that are not sensitive to consistent performance

text: Is decreasing the storage size of a DB Instance permitted?
choiceList: A. Depends on the RDMS used
